actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Subcommittee on Oversight and Courts. Approved for full committee consideration without amendment favorably.
Committee on Judiciary. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Judiciary. Reported to Senate by Senator Hatch without amendment. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 585.
Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Administrative Oversight and the Courts

official_title: A resolution to refer S.2274 entitled "A bill for the relief of Richard M. Barlow of Santa Fe, New Mexico" to the chief judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims for a report thereon.

summary.text: Refers S. 2274 (for the relief of a named individual) to the chief judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims for review and a report to the Senate.

titles.title: A resolution to refer S.2274 entitled "A bill for the relief of Richard M. Barlow of Santa Fe, New Mexico" to the chief judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims for a report thereon.
